listeners.table

Class TableFocusListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • listeners.table.TableFocusListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class TableFocusListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.FocusListener
    Implementation of FocusListener interface. Sets which Table is focused when focus is gained. This way if focus is lost to a non Table component, information of the last focused Table will not be lost.
    Author:
    Milan Radeta
